name: antisocially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is harmful to society: There’s been a problem with tourists behaving antisocially on the trains. Too many people act antisocially and drive in a way that puts others at risk.
in a way that suggests someone does not want to spend time with other people or is unfriendly: He stayed antisocially in the other room and avoided meeting my visiting family. She sat at the table, antisocially staring at her phone all through dinner. See
antisocial
